import React, { useRef } from 'react' import './Join.css' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' import { MdOutlineMail } from 'react-icons/md' import { RiMessengerLine } from 'react-icons/ri' import { BsWhatsapp } from 'react-icons/bs' const Join = () => { const form = useRef() const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_m0kidvl', 'template_2th6ig9', form.current, 'kMdT-Eiu1OiHdt1lN') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); }; return (
READY TO LEVEL UP
YOUR BODY WITH ME?

Email

Youremail@email.com
Send a message

Messenger

YourMessenger
Send a message

WhatsApp

+123456789
Send a message
) } export default Join
